titles.title: To designate the Federal building located at 709 West 9th Street in Juneau, Alaska, as the "Hurff A. Saunders Federal Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 7/16/1998--Introduced. Designates the Federal building at 709 West 9th Street in Juneau, Alaska, as the Hurff A. Saunders Federal Building.
